RDF Coder API

Other Packages
com.asemantics This package contains the CommandLine utility and the High Level API interface ( RDFCoder ).
com.asemantics.inspector  
com.asemantics.model This package defines the RDF model and the query functions over it.
com.asemantics.model.ontology This package contains classes to describe and validate model ontologies.
com.asemantics.profile Contains utility classes to define RDFCoder profiles.
com.asemantics.repository Defines utility classes to handle set of files.
com.asemantics.sourceparse Defines parses and axiliary classes.
com.asemantics.storage Contains logic to persist models.
